01-21-2012, 06:26 AM #1 iplay View Profile View Forum Posts Private Message View Blog Entries View Articles Senior Member Join Date Oct 2011 Posts 31,190 New: Hippo's Fast Food Restaurant (Games) Tweet Share
Hippo's Fast Food Restaurant 1.0
Device: iOS Universal Category: Games Price: Free, Version: 1.0 ( iTunes )
Description:
A totally free (no purchases whatsoever) and very easy to play fast food restaurant game for kids. Welcome to Hippo's Fast Food Restaurant. Kids have to serve all the customers who come to Hippo's Restaurant. The goal is to serve a minimum number of orders in the given time to clear each level. As levels increase, the difficulty increases. So be fast. Cute attractive graphics will keep kids hooked to the game. Burgers, pizzas, shakes, ice-creams, fries and lots more are available in Hippo's restaurant. Tell the kids to not feel hungry and just serve customers.This game will surely improve a kid's eye to hand co-ordination and make their fingers run super fast on the screen. Ideal free game for kids to make them more alert and enjoy.
Hippo's Fast Food Restaurant
